name: Caroline's Invitation
description:
The start takes you to level 1, levels take you to all main and secret levels and quit quits the game.

You need to left-click the buttons to activate them.

WSAD is to move for the blue player.

WSAD is to move for the red player but it goes in the reverse direction of blue.

To win you need to make the blue and red player touch.

R is used to restart and escape is used to pause the game.

Blue spikes take out the red player, while red spikes take out the blue player.

Keys can destroy enemies or random objects.

blue solid-colored blocks when touched respawn an invincible blue player, and red does so for the red player.

Black ghosts stay in one spot but can kill any player including respawned ones.

Red/Blue ghosts can only kill players that haven't respawned but they move.

Secret doors can be found that the player of the same color will need to touch to go to a secret level.

This is a project for the stem 2023 regional competition.
